```{r , echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(recipes)
hmeq <- read_csv("hmeq.csv")
cc <-  hmeq[complete.cases(hmeq) ,]
```


```{r}
library(skimr)
skim(hmeq)
skim(cc)
```


```{r}
cc %>%  count(BAD)

hmeq %>% count(BAD)
```



```{r}
library(recipes)
library(glue)
```


```{r}
hmeq <- hmeq %>%  mutate(jake = glue("{BAD}{LOAN}") ,jake2 = glue("{BAD}{LOAN} jake {LOAN}")   )
```
